prompt:
What is an example of a situation where understanding body language could be helpful?
Think about a scenario where you needed to read people's emotions to make an informed decision. For instance, imagine that you are negotiating the terms of a contract with another party and want to ensure that both parties come to a fair agreement. In this case, it would be vital to understand their non-verbal cues to evaluate their genuine interest in the position and whether they will be a good fit for your team.
